page.title: 08Education A Day at School
page.content: teaches beginners.I am a swimmer. Then when we get back we go into the hall to have dinner.After our dinner, at 12:30,we go out to play. At 1 o'clock we come in to maths.We do that for about 40 minutes.Then we do music.I like doing music.I can play the recorder and when Mr. Bagley says, "Let's have a 'B'," I play it.When we do a round Mr. Bagley says,"The front half of the class sing with Anna and the rest sing with me." So music is fun. At 2:15 we go out for our last playtime. Then at 2:30 we come in for reading. At 3 o'clock Mr. Bagley usually reads a story aloud until 3:15 when we go home.Some of us on the school bus.
